_header: Polemius was a noble man in Alexandria I-bore
Subjects: Crysanthus and Daria, saints, lives of; saints’ lives
_description: Lives of Saints Crysanthus and Daria, in one MS of the South English Legendary

Bod779.First Lines:
Polimus was a nob[l]e man in alisaundre I boreknyȝt he was
                    & gret lord so ic may telle ȝou fore…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…& bring vs to þe ioye þat lesteþ euer
                    moreþer þat þis twey marterus beþ þat wit pyne
                    abouȝt so sore
Bod779.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Des Ms. Bodl. 779 jüngere Zusatzlegenden zur südlichen
                Legendensammlung.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         82 (1889): 307-422: 336-43.
